subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Howard’s ninth-inning home run for the Phillies spoiled a dazzling performance by Matt Harvey, the promising Mets rookie right-hander, who allowed only one hit over seven innings.
snippet: Ryan Howard’s ninth-inning home run for the Phillies spoiled a dazzling performance by Matt Harvey, the promising Mets rookie right-hander, who allowed only one hit over seven innings.
